n8n_test_mode_note: In test mode, you must click 'Execute Workflow' button in N8N editor before each webhook call
production_setup: For continuous operation, activate the workflow (toggle switch) to use production webhook URLs
instructions:
System configured for production webhook with automatic date sending:
1. Page loads automatically send current date to webhook
2. Calendar clicks send selected dates to webhook
3. N8N processes data through LLM and returns response
4. 'Get AI Response' buttons fetch the LLM output
5. Response displays directly on webpage
